translation:
We are on September 12 Dear Bernardina

After having written to you, I remembered to tell you that our vicar general asks me for a slave to serve him, as he has none, and if you can spare José for this purpose I would appreciate it. About the slaves from Montevideo, if Ramirez does any trickery, I will collect from what the State owes him: therefore I am not worried about what Belém says.

Our schooners captured the sloop “Mineira” at the Lagoa dos Patos, very important.

Hugs to all and you receive the heart of yours, Almeida.

Lady Bernardina Barcelos de Almeida.
